name: Force of Negation
oracle_text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target noncreature spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text: 「現実は優しくない。現実はまったく優しくない。ならば、愚かな者、おまえたち!こうするしかない」

name: Arcane Denial
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Sidequest: Catch a Fish // Cooking Campsite

card_faces.name: Sidequest: Catch a Fish
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's an artifact or creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you put a card into your hand this way, create a Food token and transform this enchantment.
card_faces.flavor_text: "I am Noctis, Prince of Lucis and King of Fishing!"

card_faces.name: Cooking Campsite
card_faces.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {W}.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
card_faces.flavor_text:
"Seeing how you enjoy fishing, you should learn how to prepare your catch."
—Ignis Scientia

all_parts.name: Sidequest: Catch a Fish // Cooking Campsite

name: Stiltzkin, Moogle Merchant
oracle_text:
Lifelink
{2}, {T}: Target opponent gains control of another target permanent you control. If they do, you draw a card.
flavor_text: "How about a three-piece combo of Hi-Potion, Ether, and Phoenix Pinion for 444 Gil?"

name: Summon: Shiva
oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I, II — Heavenly Strike — Tap target creature an opponent controls. Put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
III — Diamond Dust — Draw a card for each tapped creature your opponents control.
flavor_text: "Let us summon a sea in a new dream world."

name: Cecil, Dark Knight // Cecil, Redeemed Paladin
type_line: Legendary Creature — Human Knight // Legendary Creature — Human Knight

card_faces.name: Cecil, Dark Knight
card_faces.oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Darkness — Whenever Cecil deals damage, you lose that much life. Then if your life total is less than or equal to half your starting life total, untap Cecil and transform it.
card_faces.flavor_text: "I suppose this is my fate as a dark knight. Soon, I won't even feel remorse for my actions."

card_faces.name: Cecil, Redeemed Paladin
card_faces.oracle_text:
Lifelink
Protect — Whenever Cecil attacks, other attacking creatures gain indestructible until end of turn.
card_faces.flavor_text: "This is my battle, one I must fight alone to atone for my wrongs."

name: Tonberry
oracle_text:
This creature enters tapped with a stun counter on it. (If it would become untapped, remove a stun counter from it instead.)
Chef's Knife — During your turn, this creature has first strike and deathtouch.
flavor_text: Fearful monsters that creep ever forward, knives poised with deadly intent.

name: Zell Dincht
oracle_text:
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Zell Dincht gets +1/+0 for each land you control.
At the beginning of your end step, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: "My weapons are these fists of mine!"

name: Jumbo Cactuar
oracle_text: 10,000 Needles — Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +9999/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some Cactuars live long lives and grow huge. This Jumbo Cactuar is one of them.

name: Sazh's Chocobo
oracle_text: Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
flavor_text: The chick has no name, as voicing the true identity of the animal might trigger ripples of destiny across Cocoon and cause a hurricane in Eden. Either that, or Sazh just hasn't thought of one yet.

Vigilance
Whenever Emet-Selch enters or attacks, draw a card, then discard a card.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are fourteen or more cards in your graveyard, you may transform Emet-Selch.

card_faces.name: Hades, Sorcerer of Eld
card_faces.oracle_text:
Vigilance
Echo of the Lost — During your turn, you may play cards from your graveyard.
If a card or token would be put into your graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.
card_faces.flavor_text: "What will become of our triumphs? Our hopes? Our... our despair?"

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
{3}{B}{B}{R}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield transformed. Activate only as a sorcery.
card_faces.flavor_text: "I, Garland, will knock you all down!"

card_faces.name: Chaos, the Endless
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
When Chaos dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.
card_faces.flavor_text: "Even as you die again and again, I shall return!"

name: Gladiolus Amicitia
oracle_text:
When Gladiolus Amicitia enters, search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, another target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Guard the king with our lives—that's the way it's always been."

name: Sin, Spira's Punishment
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Sin enters or attacks, exile a permanent card from your graveyard at random, then create a tapped token that's a copy of that card. If the exiled card is a land card, repeat this process.

name: Cloud, Planet's Champion
oracle_text:
During your turn, as long as Cloud is equipped, it has double strike and indestructible. (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)
Equip abilities you activate that target Cloud cost {2} less to activate.
flavor_text: "It's not over yet... this isn't the end!"

name: Sephiroth, Planet's Heir
oracle_text:
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)
When Sephiroth enters, creatures your opponents control get -2/-2 until end of turn.
Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sephiroth.
flavor_text: "This is the end... for all of you."
